abstract.p: On the recommendation of Zulfiqar Khan, the Mughal emperor Aurangzeb Alamgir forgives the Maratha ruler of Thanjavur Shahuji Bhonsle for rebellion after he paid thirty thousand rupees as tribute, surrendered several forts, and promised not to assist his cousin, the Maratha king Rajaram.Zulfiqar Khan's campaign against Shahuji Bhonsla, and the resulting qaul-nama that set out the terms of submission, which are also described in this document, is discussed Sarkar, History of Aurangzib, Vol. 5, pp. 80-2. For a description of the assistance Shahuji Bhonsla had previously provided Rajaram Bhonsla, see p. 61 of the same volume.

div.p: In His name, may He be praised, the [Lord] most high

son of Sahib Qiran"Sahib Qiran," which may be translated as "Lord of Conjunction," was a title referring to an ideal ruler whose messianic rise coincides with the powerful conjunction of the planets Saturn and Jupiter. It was particularly associated with the Turco-Mongol warlord Timur, and later appropriated by the Mughal emperor Shah Jahan. For further discussion, see Moin, The Millennial Sovereign, pp. 23-55. div.p:
زبدة الاقران خلاصة الاخوان مطیع الاسلام ساهوجی بهونسلا
بنوازش پادشاهی امیدوار بوده بداند که درین ایام فیروزی انجام
از نوشته خانه زاد فدوی شجاعت نشان ذوالفقار خان بهادر بعرض مقدس معلی رسید که آنمطیع الاسلام از تقصیرات گذشته
پیشمان گشته بیاوری نیک اختری کمربندگی و فرمانبری بر میان جان بسته مبلغ سی لک روپیه پشکش سرکار فلک مدار نموده
من جمله آن بیست لک روپیه از نقد و جنس بوصول رسانیده قلعه پالم کوتا وغیرها سه قلعه را با ولایات متعلقه تسلیم اولیاء دولت قاهره غالبه
کرده متعهد شده که پیرامون امداد رامآء شقاوت سیما ظاهراً و باطنا نگردد و التماس صدور فرمان والا شان مرحمت عنوان نموده
بنابرین فضل و کرم پادشاهانه از راه ذره پروری و عاطفت گستری او را بعنایت اصدار اینمثال واجب الامتثال که پیرانه امان و سرمآ
اطمینان او است متضمن نوید عفو و صفح جرائم و مأثم و موهبت خلعت فاخره و فیل و پدک مرصع نواخته بشرط احتراز و اجتناب از معاونت
و موافقت رامآء روسیاه و رفیقان گمراه او بمرحمت خطاب کلان راجگی و زمینداری محالی که در تصرف آنزبده الاقران است
مطابق اسناد بیجاپوریان امتیاز و اعتبار بخشید باید که سپاس و ستایش بخشش و بخشایش والا بجای آورده بر منهج رسوخ اطاعت
و فرمانبرداری و خلوص انقیاد و خدمتگزاری ثابت و مستقیم بوده بر طبق قرار داد خویشتن همه پشکش را بخزانه عامره عائد کند و
چنانکه تعهد نموده از اعانت رامآء مقهور و همراهایش دوری گزیده پیوسته در تقدیم خدمات پادشاهی و لوازم دولتخواهی کوشیده خان بهادر را
از خود راضی و شاکر داشته در کشتن و بستن آن خاسر مدبر اهتمام تمام بعمل آورد و حسن بندگی را مثمر نتایج نیک شناسد یازدهم محرم سال سی و هشتم از جلوس والا نوشته شد

Eminent among Contemporaries, Select among Brothers, Obedient of Islam, Shahuji Bhonsla,
having hoped for imperial kindness, know that in these victorious times,
from the writing of the house-born devoted servant, the brave Zulfiqar Khan Bahadur, it has been represented to His Divine Highness that the Obedient to Islam [Shahuji Bhonsla],
having repented his past errors, [and] with the coming of good fortune, having tied belt of determination and obedience in [to] his heart, has presented 30 lakh rupees as pishkash to the government that is the support of the heavens.
Out of this, he has caused 20 lakh rupees to be received in cash and goods [and] has submitted Palamkottah fort, etc., [in total] three forts, with associated territories to the guardians of the conquering and victorious government.For Zulfiqar Khan's siege of Palamkottah in 1694, see Khobrekar, English Translation of Tarikh-i-Dilkasha, pp. 195, 197.
He has promised that regarding Rama [i.e. Rajaram Bhonsla] the wretched-faced, there shall be no open or clandestine aid. And having petitioned for the issuance of an exalted farman of august favour,
on this basis, by way of nurturing the little [people] and dispersing affection, the imperial kindness and compassion favours him with the production of this royal mandate fit for obedience, which is his security in old age and a means of protection,
including the good news of the erasure and forgiveness of offenses and sins, and the gift of prestigious robes of honour and an elephant and a decorated medal is bestowed, [and] on the condition that he abstains [from] and avoids assistance [to]
and agreement [with] Rama [i.e. Rajaram Bhonsla] the black-faced and his misguided companions, he is distinguished and honoured by the favour of the great title of kingship and the zamindari of the districts that are in possession of that Eminent among Contemporaries [Shahuji Bhonsla] .
in accordance with the documents of the Bijapuris. It is necessary that giving thanks and praise for the exalted mercy and generosity, he should be on the road of firm submission
and obedience and pure subjection and steadfast service, [and] according to his own engagement, deposit all the tribute in the treasury of the protector. And
as promised, he will stay away from giving assistance to the defeated Rama [i.e. Rajaram Bhonsla] and his companions, and by endeavouring to perform imperial services and loyal necessities, Khan Bahadur [Zulfiqar Khan]
will be pleased with and grateful to him, [and] in killing and fettering that unfortunate loser [Rama], everything will be managed. And the beauty of servitude will know many fruitful results. Written on the eleventh of Muharram of the thirty-eighth year of the exalted reign.
